mapper.insert: insert into user values(null, #{role}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, "", now(), now(), 0, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT no, role, name, status, profile FROM user

choose.when: update user set status='0', logout_time=now() where no=#{no};
choose.otherwise: update user set status='1', login_time=now() where no=#{no};

mapper.update: update user set email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} where no=#{no};
